content:
If I open the Composition (get from the http://vonk.furore.com StructureDefinition/Composition/_history/5f6b8dcb-4f37-4275-8177-83a37d537bcf) resource with forge (16.5.1).
I have this validation error
Message : Element 'Composition.section.section' is not available in the corresponding resource.
Severity: Warning
Source : section
Context : Composition / section

Any suggestion on how to avoid this ?
